name: White Snake

trigger.text: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, then place them in any order at the top or bottom of your deck.

text: Up to one of your leader or characters gain +1000 for this turn. Then, draw 1 card.

effect.text: Up to one of your leader or characters gain +1000 for this turn. Then, draw 1 card.
Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, then place them in any order at the top or bottom of your deck.

meta.notes: Card marked as 'SAMPLE' in image, but rarity is UC as printed.
